A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only reason I gave this movie 2 stars is because of the CGI. As a Huge Star Wars Fan\, I have to say. This movie is pointless and a waste of time. The writer of this movie is an idiot and has destroyed everything that Star Wars was built on. If you haven't seen this movie and you are a Big Star Wars fan. Don't waste your time or money. This movie is horrible.
